languages.text: "///Номос есть страж. Мы пробудились, когда на корабль проник чужой свет. Мы защитили тебя, когда тебе нужна была помощь. Мы сопровождали тебя, когда вокруг была опасность".

traits.locale_text: "///Номос есть страж. Мы защитили тебя, когда тебе нужна была помощь. Мы сопровождали тебя, когда вокруг была опасность".

languages.text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
languages.original_text: "///Номос есть страж. Мы пробудились, когда на корабль проник чужой свет. Мы защитили тебя, когда тебе нужна была помощь. Мы сопровождали тебя, когда вокруг была опасность".

traits.locale_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
"///Nomos are a sentinel. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
"///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
"///Nomos are a sentinel. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
"///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."
"///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

languages.text: 「///ノモスはセンチネルです。奇妙な光が船内に侵入したとき、我々は目を覚ました。我々はあなたが助けを必要としている時にあなたを守り、我々はあなたが危険に晒されている時にあなたを保護しました」
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: 「///ノモスはセンチネルです。奇妙な光が船内に侵入したとき、我々は目を覚ました。我々はあなたが助けを必要としている時にあなたを守り、我々はあなたが危険に晒されている時にあなたを保護しました」

languages.text: “///诺莫斯是个哨兵，当那束古怪的光芒侵入这艘飞船时，我们苏醒了过来。我们在你需要帮助的时候保护了你。在你被危险包围时，我们守护了你。”
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: “///诺莫斯是个哨兵，我们在你需要帮助的时候保护了你。在你被危险包围时，我们守护了你。”

languages.text: "///Nomos sind ein Wächter. Wir sind erwacht, als das merkwürdige Licht in das Schiff eingedrungen ist. Wir haben Euch beschützt, als Ihr Hilfe benötigt habt. Wir haben Euch eskortiert, als Ihr von Gefahr umgeben wart."
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: "///Nomos sind ein Wächter. Wir haben Euch beschützt, als Ihr Hilfe benötigt habt. Wir haben Euch eskortiert, als Ihr von Gefahr umgeben wart."

languages.text: « ///Nous sommes une sentinelle. Nous nous sommes éveillés quand l'étrange lueur a envahi le vaisseau. Nous vous avons {mf|protégé|protégée} lorsque vous aviez besoin d'aide. Nous vous avons {mf|escorté|escortée} lorsque vous étiez en danger. »
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: « ///Nous sommes une sentinelle. Nous vous avons {mf|protégé|protégée} lorsque vous aviez besoin d'aide. Nous vous avons {mf|escorté|escortée} lorsque vous étiez en danger. »

languages.text: «///Nomos somos un centinela. Despertamos cuando la extraña luz inundó la nave. Le protegimos cuando necesitó ayuda. Le escoltamos cuando estuvo en peligro».
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: «///Nomos son un centinela. Le protegimos cuando necesitó ayuda. Le escoltamos cuando estuvo en peligro».

languages.text: "///Nomos bir nöbetçi. Tuhaf ışık gemiyi işgal ettiği sırada uyandık. Yardıma ihtiyacınız olduğunda sizi koruduk. Tehlike sizi kapana kıstırdığında size refakat ettik."
languages.original_text: "///Nomos are a sentinel. We awoke when the strange light invaded the ship. We protected you when you needed help. We escorted you when you were surrounded by danger."

traits.locale_text: "///Nomos bie nöbetçi. Tuhaf ışık gemiyi işgal ettiği sırada uyandık. Yardıma ihtiyacınız olduğunda sizi koruduk. Tehlike tarafından kapana kıstırıldığınızda size refakat ettik."
